meta.title: ADI — Agent Development Infrastructure
meta.description: Build, deploy, and orchestrate autonomous AI agents. 30+ Rust libraries, plugin architecture, containerized runtime. Free for individuals.

individual.title: Individual Developer
individual.description: Free CLI, local agents, bring your own keys

enterprise.title: Enterprise
enterprise.description: Self-hosted, SSO, audit logs, dedicated support

platform.title: Platform Builder
platform.description: Embed agent runtime into your own product

hero.footnote: Each path shows tailored features, pricing, and documentation.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

underConstruction.title: Under Construction
underConstruction.description: This section is being built. Check back soon.

developers.metaDescription: Free CLI, local agents, bring your own keys. AI-powered development that you control.
developers.headline: Your AI agent, your keys, your machine
developers.subheadline: Install the CLI, plug in your API keys, and start building with autonomous agents. Free forever for individual use.
developers.ctaDescription: One command to install. Bring your own API keys. No account required.

teams.metaDescription: Shared infrastructure, team workflows, and usage analytics for engineering teams.
teams.headline: Scale AI agents across your team
teams.subheadline: Shared configuration, centralized key management, and usage analytics. From one developer to your whole engineering org.
teams.ctaDescription: Start with the free tier. Add team features when you're ready.

enterprise.metaDescription: Self-hosted AI agent infrastructure with SSO, audit logs, and dedicated support.
enterprise.headline: AI agents that stay on your network
enterprise.subheadline: Self-hosted deployment, SSO integration, audit logging, and dedicated support. Built for organizations that need control.
enterprise.ctaDescription: Schedule a demo or request a security review. We'll tailor the deployment to your requirements.

contributors.metaDescription: 30+ Rust crates, plugin SDK, and an active community. Come build with us.
contributors.headline: 30+ Rust crates. Come build with us.
contributors.subheadline: Source-available infrastructure, plugin SDK, and a growing ecosystem. Whether you write crates or plugins — there's room for you.
contributors.ctaDescription: Clone the repo, pick an issue, and ship your first PR.

platform-builders.metaDescription: Embed ADI's agent runtime, crates, and plugin system into your own product.
platform-builders.headline: Embed agent intelligence into your product
platform-builders.subheadline: Use ADI's Rust crates, agent runtime, and plugin system as building blocks for your own platform. No need to build from scratch.
platform-builders.ctaDescription: Explore the crate catalog, try the runtime API, or reach out for partnership.
